metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0228 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: [netfilter: nf_tables: skip set commit for deleted/destroyed sets]

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
